Control.name: ItemTrig_UITemplate_WScrollSelectListItem
Control.OnMouseUp: if button == MOUSE_BUTTON_INDEX_LEFT and upInside then -- the mousedown event happened on this same control local list = self:GetParent():GetParent() local widget = ItemTrig.UI.WScrollSelectList:cast(list) widget:_onItemSelected(self) end
Control.OnMouseDoubleClick: if button == MOUSE_BUTTON_INDEX_LEFT then local list = self:GetParent():GetParent() local widget = ItemTrig.UI.WScrollSelectList:cast(list) widget:_onDoubleClick(self) end
